headline: Dividend Powerhouse Altria Group (MO) Lures Value Investors With 7% Yield
summary: If you’re seeking a dependable dividend stock with a generous yield, Altria Group (MO)—the U.S. parent company of Marlboro—is hard to ignore. Offering a nearly 7% dividend yield and boasting over 50 years of uninterrupted dividend growth, Altria stands out as a true Dividend King. I’m bullish on the stock thanks to its strong track record of shareholder returns, not just through consistent dividend hikes but also through substantial and regular share buybacks.
